caption.center: Charles P.R. Macaulay, plaintiff in error, v. Mary Kelly, defendant in

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Chicago, First District.

opinion.posture:
Action upon judgment note. Judgment for defendant.
Error to the Circuit Court of Cook county; the Hon. Oscar E. Heard, Judge, presiding. Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the March term, 1926.
opinion.attorneys: Walter B. Prendergast, for plaintiff in error. No appearance for defendant in error.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Presiding Justice McSurely delivered the opinion of the court.
